headlines.description: — Caris LeVert scored 20 of his season-high 31 points in the first half and the Indiana Pacers sent the Detroit Pistons to their 13th straight loss, 122-113 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Caris LeVert scores 31 points, Pacers beat Pistons 122-113

headlines.description: — With so much of his team missing, Kevin Durant probably needs to play great for the Brooklyn Nets to win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Durant carries Nets past 76ers for another short-handed win

events.name: New York Knicks at Houston Rockets

headlines.description: — Immanuel Quickley hit seven 3-pointers and scored 24 points to help the short-handed New York Knicks beat the Houston Rockets 116-103 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Quickly hits 7 3-pointers, short-handed Knicks beat Rockets

headlines.description: — Chris Paul and Deandre Ayton had a good time in the fourth quarter, celebrating dunks and 3-pointers, high-fiving teammates and generally taking it easy.
headlines.shortLinkText: Balanced Suns cruise past Wizards, tie Warriors for NBA lead
